cdif.bbr.metadata.cdifProperties.cdifPhy.title: Physical Mapping Type
cdif.bbr.metadata.cdifProperties.cdifPhy.description: Defines implementation-specific properties for the representation of a variable in a dataset. Aligned with CDIF 2026 schema using DDI-CDI flat per-column mapping structure.

cdi:index.description: Non-negative integer that orders the fields in the data structure (column number).

cdi:format.description: A format for number expressed as a string, or date format like YYYY/MM or MM-DD-YY.

cdi:length.description: The column width if the tabular text is fixed width.

cdi:nullSequence.description: The value of this property becomes the null annotation for the described column.

cdi:defaultValue.description: A default string indicating the value to substitute for an empty string.

cdi:formats_InstanceVariable.description: Reference to a variable defined in schema:variableMeasured.

@id.description: This should be a reference to a variable defined in the schema:variableMeasured section.

title: Data Cube Type
description: Multi-dimensional data cube structure using DDI-CDI. Typed as ada:dataCube and cdi:StructuredDataSet per CDIF 2026 alignment.

cdi:hasPhysicalMapping.description: Links variables to their physical representation in this dataset.

cdi:locator.description: String that can be used by software to locate values of the variable in this physical dataset.
